  • Uses of Size2D in com.xebisco.yield

    Subclasses of Size2D in com.xebisco.yield
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    ImmutableSize2D
    The ImmutableSize2D class extends Size2D and overrides the setX and setY methods to throw an exception, making it immutable.
